files.patch:
@@ -49,3 +49,0 @@ - *

- * Most application developers should use the {@link HeaderBar} implementation instead of - * creating a custom header bar. @@ -53,0 +50,2 @@ + * @apiNote Most application developers should use the {@link HeaderBar} implementation instead of + * creating a custom header bar. @@ -153,1 +152,4 @@ - * the left side of the window, the returned area is empty. + * the left side of the window, the returned area is an empty {@code Dimension2D}. + *

+ * Note that the left system inset refers to the physical left side of the window, + * independent of layout orientation. @@ -174,1 +176,4 @@ - * the right side of the window, the returned area is empty. + * the right side of the window, the returned area is an empty {@code Dimension2D}. + *

+ * Note that the right system inset refers to the physical right side of the window, + * independent of layout orientation.
